subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Rowing
lead_paragraph: In Olympics-saturated London, a small group of watermen recently gathered, as they have annually since 1715, to row in the Doggett’s Coat and Badge race.
snippet: In Olympics-saturated London, a small group of watermen recently gathered, as they have annually since 1715, to row in the Doggett’s Coat and Badge race.
